title.narrative: OUTPUT 11: Water, Sanitation, and Hygiene (WASH) ENABLING ENVIRONMENT

description.narrative: Improved social accountability systems in place for Water, Sanitation, and Hygiene (WASH) sector services, which contributes to Climate Change, Disaster Risks And Envionmental Degradation, Safe And Equitable Water, Sanitation And Hygiene Services And Practices, Water, Sanitation And Hygiene Systems And Empowerment Of Communities, Water, Sanitation And Hygiene Systems And Empowerment Of Communities (Covid). UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Communications, Advocacy And Public Engagement, Data, Research, Evaluation And Knowledge Management, Developing And Leveraging Resources And Partnerships, Evaluations, Research And Data, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building, Systems Strengthening To Leave No One Behind. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: More children and their families have access to basic sanitation, supported by more effective national strategies

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Improved social accountability systems in place for WASH sector services

description.narrative: The national independent sustainability check study completed in 2021 focused on the WASH services (and infrastructures) in rural schools and communities. The study spearheaded by the National Development Planning Commission (NDPC) with technical support from MSWR reviled serious functionality issues in community and school water supply (on average 30% not functioning). The final;report has been submitted to MSWR for further dissemination and action by stakeholders. ;CONIWAS engaged the parliamentary select committee on water and sanitation advocating for increased funding to WASH;sector.; Sustainable WASH Programme Plan, 2022-2030 and the Mid-term Development Plan, 2022-2025 were also drafted in 2021.; | Status:On-track | As-of Date:07/01/2022

title.narrative: Annual Sector Performance Report is completed with input from Civil Society(52991)

actual.value: 2021:Consultant selected to develop the 2020/21 sector performance report
